23.eng-name: The Book of the Rules of Inheritance

hadiths.text: Abu Ishaq said that he heard al-Bara' b. 'Azib (Allah be pleased with him) say:The last complete sura revealed (in the Holy Qur'an) is Sura Tauba (i e. al-Bara'at, ix.), and the last verse revealed is that pertaining to Kalala

chapter.ara-name: باب آخِرِ آيَةٍ أُنْزِلَتْ آيَةُ الْكَلاَلَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Last Verse To Be Revealed Was The Verse Of Kalalah
